description: Turn bathtime into a fun experience with this Da Bomb Bath Fizzers Cake Bomb Bath Soak. It has a luscious almond buttercream scent, and it's white with rainbow sprinkles to replicate the look of a birthday cake. When you drop it into the water, this fizzing bath bomb releases its nourishing ingredients into the water, revealing a special surprise. This bath soak is vegan and cruelty-free, and it contains no phthalates, parabens, sulfates, gluten or nut products.

description:
Raw Sugar Bath Fizzer: Raw Coconut + Mango

Your bath is calling!! Relax everything with this cool cube of bath fizzy goodness. Dip into an invigorating and mood-lifting soak that will leave your skin and mind feeling nourished and refreshed. Packed into each of these "Raw Sugar Cube" Fizzers is a sensational explosion of 12 essential oils. The extracts of Raw Coconut with protecting and moisturizing skin benefits, and Mango, loaded with Vitamin A, to promote a healthy sun-kissed glow. These, combined with the perfect amount of Kaolin Clay, Lavender Sea Kelp and Ginger, is oh so gently the flawless blend for purifying your skin.

Processed through ColdPress Technology® and infused with Certified Organic Extracts to lock in all that is pure, this wholesome bath fizzer is bubbling with nutrients-just add water-and soak!

Consciously crafted in sunny Southern California, these Cold-Pressed Bath Fizzers nature your skin and soak your senses with nature's most purifying ingredients-fruits, plants and essential goodness.

Get the goods that give back-A clean world starts at home, so as part of the Raw Sugar Initiative-a fresh bar of soap is donated to a family in need for every product sold.
title: Raw Sugar Cube Bath Fizzers - Raw Coconut Mango Bath Bomb - 4ct

Cruelty-Free
Vegan-Free

Nubian Heritage's Coconut & Papaya Bath Bombs invigorate, hydrate and soothe the skin. Relax as the lush, tropical scent of Coconut & Papaya envelops your senses while the transformed water cleanses and softens, leaving your skin delicately fragranced.

Heritage: Since ancient times, Coconut Oil has been revered for its skin protecting and moisturizing benefits by millions in tropical communities in South America, Asia, the Caribbean and Africa. Coconut Oil contains healthy fats keeping skin soft to the touch. Papaya has been revered by natives for its skin rejuvenating properties.

description: Your skin will smell oh-so sweet and feel softer than ever after you use the Scented Bath Fizzer from Tri-Coastal Design. This white bath bomb features a lovely vanilla scent that'll awaken your senses while leaving your skin smelling delectable. It's a breeze to use - simply drop it into a tub filled with warm water and watch the bubbles come alive as the bath bomb fizzes away.
title: Vanilla Frost Scented Bath Bomb - 5.3oz

bullets: White bath bomb is perfect for adding to a bath ritual

Great for adding to a bath gift set for any special occasion
